statements: DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE id = 100;
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_location LIKE 'City Center';
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE id = 5 AND disposal_location = 'Landfill';
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND recycling_optimized = TRUE;
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE waste_id = 1001
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill'
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE waste_type = 'plastic';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE recycling_status = true AND disposal_location = 'landfill';
DELETE FROM waste_disposal WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM recycled_materials WHERE material_type = 'plastic';
DELETE FROM recycled_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND collection_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' AND disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE weight > 100 AND collection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM RecyclingProcesses WHERE efficiency < 0.5 AND start_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM WasteCollectionEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
DELETE FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE material_accepted = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM WasteMaterials WHERE material_id = 3;
DELETE FROM CollectionEmployees WHERE assigned_route_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM WasteRoutes WHERE distance > 100);
